name: VRC Graffiti
author: Absolute Stratos
description: Functional graffiti can prefab for VR Chat avatars for spraying images onto VRC world objects

name: Complex Conditional Direct Blendtrees Examples Prefab for VRChat 3.0 Avatars
author: Fuujin
description: This prefab provides examples, how you can make toggles in direct blendtrees with multiple conditions. For example it includes an example of toggling a toggle when two parameters are true (AND) and an example of toggling an item when one ore more parameters are true (OR)

name: OSC Parameter Sync system for VRChat 3.0 Avatars - Unlimited Avatar Parameters
author: Fuujin
description:
This allows you to use more than the 256 memory allowed for you to use by VRChat.
To learn more about the conditions and use, please read the description on the product page. A video tutorial is included !

name: VRC Skeletal Hands
author: Dyslex1k
description: Drag& Drop avatar setup and OSC app that allows Skeletal Input in VRChat.

name: Light Limit Changer for MA
author: Azukimochi
description: A tool that relies on Modular Avatar to easily and non-destructively introduce lighting change animations for lilToon/Poiyomi/Sunao shaders. In addition to brightness, it also supports color temperature, saturation, Unlit, and monochrome animation.

name: Dynamic VRC Floor Collider
author: BluWizard10
description: A simple Floor Collider system that dynamically retains it's position on the Floor when you jump, allowing rigged Tails of long length to look more natural. Uses the new VRC Constraints system for optimal performance.

name: Hackebein's Object Tracking
author: Hackebein
description: Track your real objects and track them in VRChat. All SteamVR/OpenVR tracker are supported.

name: ?VRC?????Silhouette Torch! Interactive Flashlight For Avatars 3.0!
author: Okaeri Game Studio
description: An interactive torch light for Avatars 3.0!

name: Base Animations menu for VRChat 3.0 Avatars
author: Fuuujin
description: The default animations menu that VRChat puts on your avatar if you do not use a custome menu for your avatar. Wave, Dance, etc.

name: Modular Avatar
author: bd_
description: Tools for non-destructive avatar assembly and avatar gimmick installation

name: Steve's Avatar PvP System
author: Steve the Mitochondria
description: A simple PvP system using contact senders and receivers with several damage type examples.

name: Synced Roller
author: Skipper
description: A synced simple d20 roller for VRC

name: Entorix FAB Flight and Boost
author: Entorix
description: A Simple prefab for VRChat 3.0 Avatars that lets you fly and boost forward (while in the air)

name: Entorix Collision Trigger
author: Entorix
description: A basic particle death stop-action/avatar dynamics based collision detector that allows the triggering of animations when the gameobject collides with a generic collider

name: Full body sitting layer
author: Dannyboi
description: A sitting layer for 3.0 avatars that lets you keep full body while in a station, and reverts to normal sitting when in half-body or desktop
